cast.name: 保罗·威廉姆斯 Paul Williams

awards:
第18届美国评论家选择电影奖(2013)
　　最佳歌曲(提名) 保罗·威廉姆斯

　　第17届金卫星奖(2012)
　　电影部门 最佳原创歌曲(提名) 保罗·威廉姆斯
introduction: A documentary filmmaker tracks down Grammy and Oscar award-winning actor/singer/songwriter Paul Williams in an attempt to find out what happened to his fallen idol. Paul Williams was one of the biggest stars of the 1970s. He was everywhere – on The Tonight Show 50 times and appeared on variety shows, sitcoms, game shows and movies from The Love Boat to Phantom of the Paradise. But in the 1980s, he just disappeared. This movie is about what happened when filmmaker Stephen Kessler finds him.
